    Professional discrete color presets by 'I want hue'

    color_pro.Rd

    Generate professional color presets from 'I want hue' color tool

    color_pro(
  n,
  col.space = c("default", "light", "red", "yellow", "green", "blue", "purple"),
  sort = c("hue", "diff"),
  set = 1
)

    Arguments

    n

    How many colors to generate

    col.space

    Color space, Options: "default", "light", "red", "yellow", "green", "blue", or "purple"

    sort

    Sort colors by hue (default) or differentiation, Options: "hue", "diff"

    set

    Several random presets, Default: 1

    Value

    Vector of colors

    Details

    Random color presets generated from: https://medialab.github.io/iwanthue/

    Examples

    color_pro(10)

    Contents

    Developed by Yichao Hua.
